testcase.name: Get all tags
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://conduit.productionready.io/api/' ....................... passed Given path 'tags' ......................................................... passed When method Get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response.tags contains ['Gandhi', 'test'] ....................... passed And match response.tags !contains ['truck'] ............................... passed And match response.tags == "#array" ...................................... passed And match each response.tags == "#string" ................................ passed
